member.name: T:Syncfusion.SharedWindowsAssembly
member.summary: This class holds the name of the Syncfusion.Shared.Windows assembly and provides a helper routine that helps with resolving types when loading a serialization stream and when the framework probes for assemblies by reflection.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SharedWindowsAssembly.Name
member.summary: The full name of this assembly without version information: "Syncfusion.Shared.Windows"

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SharedWindowsAssembly.Assembly
member.summary: A reference to the for the grid assembly.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SharedWindowsAssembly.RootNamespace
member.summary: The root namespace of this assembly. Used internally for locating resources within the assembly.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.SharedWindowsAssembly.AssemblyResolver(System.Object,System.ResolveEventArgs)
member.summary: This delegate helps with resolving types and can be used as a eventhandler for a event.
member.param: The source of the event.
The event data with information about the type.
member.returns: A reference to the assembly where the type is located.
member.remarks: Use this handler when reading back types from a serialization stread saved with an earlier version of this assembly.
